title: Breaking through (Captioned)
creator_credit: Kristen Dunphy, Megan Heyward and Margaret Lupton
brief_description: Produced for the Australian Deafness Council, this informative and supportive video encourages deaf students to look positively at a broad range of jobs which they may not have considered. It shows young deaf people at work in a wide variety of fields from professional to unskilled, and looks at some of the problems they may encounter.
creator_credit_for_label: Kristen Dunphy, Megan Heyward and Margaret Lupton
